title: Europeanbarging Offers 50% Off 2nd Person on 5 Day Seine River Cruises - Travelandtourworld.comTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Europeanbarging Offers 50% Off 2nd Person on 5 Day Seine River Cruises Published on : Monday, July 6, 2015
Europeanbarging is offering special pricing and included excursions on 2 August departures on one of France’s most popular rivers. The Seine River is one of the most enchanting rivers of Europe and many attractions are associated with it such as landscapes of vineyards, historic abbeys, Norman castles, tranquil orchards and medieval towns. The 4 night cruise starts in Paris and cruises down the Seine River to Honfleur and returns to Paris. Featured stops are Les Andelys, Rouen, Honfleur, Caudebec en Caux and Vernon. Discounted rates are $870 per person on the August 12, 2015 departure on the main deck and August 21, 2015 offers $940 per person for the main deck cabins and $1050 for the upper deck cabins.
“For these special packages, rates include unlimited complimentary onboard beverages, including beer, fine wine, spirits, mineral bottled water, soft drinks specialty coffees and tea as well as the excursions – Tour of Martainville Château, Rouen, Honfleur and its incomparable charm, The “Côte Fleurie” (Flowered Coast) and its string of seaside resorts and Paris, the City of Light and free Wi-Fi in addition to all meals and port taxes.” – Jan Baumgartner
About European Barging
European Barging has been European river cruises and barging products since 1998. The company has served many guests to the most alluring locations in France including Burgundy, Chablis, Alsace, Loire, Provence, Canal du Midi and Bordeaux.
